plot outline: Ellellu Neene Nannallu Neene movie is a romantic movie and is about the love between a couple, cutting across the class divide. But the girl's brother who is an estate owner opposes the affair and mistakenly knockout the boy. He later realises that his sister is already pregnant. The story takes a curious turn from here.
title: Ellellu Neene Nannallu Neene
